map.title: Tour about the use of the map
map.description: Along this tour, you will be shown the main tools for the use of the map

button.title: Navegation
button.description: Using these buttons you can zoom in or zoom out. You can also do this with the mouse wheel, or by drawing a box while pressing the SHIFT key.

button.title: Rotation
button.description: With the button pressed, you can apply a rotation to the map. This is especially useful if you want to print a map, and apply rotation to it.

button.title: Zoom to default extent
button.description: Pressing this button will return the map extent to the initial extent.

button.title: Measurements
button.description: Using this tool, you can make measurements of lines or polygons.

button.title: GPS Location
button.description: Using this tool, you can activate GPS tracking.

button.title: Show legend
button.description: Shows the legend. There you can activate/deactivate the visibility of the map elements, or access the attribute lists of the map layers.

button.title: Show basemaps
button.description: Displays the available basemaps options.

button.title: Show results table
button.description: Displays the table of registered items.

button.title: Information tool
button.description: Once the tool is activated, you can access the properties of the entities by clicking on them on the map.

button.title: Show map printout
button.description: Displays map printing functions

button.title: Point drawing tool
button.description: Activate the tool to draw new points. Once the point has been drawn, the target layer will be requested, if several are available.

button.title: Line drawing tool
button.description: Activate the tool to draw new lines. Once the line has been drawn, the target layer will be requested, if several are available

button.title: Polygon drawing tool
button.description: Activate the tool to draw new polygons. Once the polygon has been drawn, the target layer will be requested, if several are available.

button.title: Close tables
button.description: Close all open tables.

button.title: Hide tables
button.description: Hide all open tables

button.title: Close table
button.description: Close the table.

text.title: Description of records
text.description: The total number of records, the number of records displayed in the table and in the map and the number of selected records in the table.

filter.title: Filter by extension
filter.description: Click on the button to activate the filter. Records that are visible in the map window will be displayed in the table. Click the button again to deactivate the filter.

link.title: Download
link.description: You can download the table data in the following formats: SHP, geojson, kml, gpkg, gpx, xlsx and csv.

link.title: Selector
link.description: Clear selection is used to remove all selections. Delete selected items is used to delete the database records. Edit attributes of selected elements is used to modify the attributes of the elements. Zoom to selection is used to zoom in on the selected elements on the map.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Tools: 1. Selection, 2. Attribute display, 3. Attribute editing, 4. Delete record.

button.title: Filter by query
button.description: Clicking this button opens a window for entering queries and filtering.

button.title: Create a new record
button.description: Clicking this button opens a window to enter a new record in the table.

button.title: Delete all filters
button.description: Clicking this button removes all filters and displays the table in its original state.

button.title: Edit attributes
button.description: By clicking this button, you can enable the window for editing the attributes of this element.

button.title: Edit geometry
button.description: By clicking this button, you can change the position of the item on the map.

button.title: Delete item
button.description: Clicking this button will delete the item permanently.

button.title: Zoom to element
button.description: Clicking this button zooms in to the element on the map.

button.title: Documentary record
button.description: Clicking this button will open a window where the images associated with this element will be displayed. You will also have the possibility of uploading images, videos or other documents that will be associated with this element.

button.title: Schedule
button.description: Clicking this button opens a window with a timetable.

button.title: Content reader
button.description: Clicking this button will activate the automatic reading of the contents of the form sheet.

button.title: Save
button.description: Clicking this button saves the changes made to the attributes of this element.

button.title: Exit
button.description: Clicking this button exits attribute editing. Before exiting, the user is asked whether he/she wants to save the changes or not.

button.title: Add query
button.description: By clicking this button you add a new query to the list.

query.title: Query
query.description: To define the query, first select the field, then the operator and finally the value. The operator that joins the queries is AND. there is also a button to delete the query.

button.title: Accept
button.description: By clicking this button executes all queries in the list.

button.title: Create
button.description: Clicking this button displays a form to create a new user.

button.title: Edit
button.description: Clicking this button enables editing of user attributes.

button.title: Delete
button.description: Clicking this button deletes the user permanently.

button.title: Create
button.description: Clicking this button displays a form to create a new management unit.

button.title: Edit
button.description: Clicking this button enables editing of management unit attributes.

button.title: Delete
button.description: Clicking this button deletes the management unit permanently.

button.title: Create
button.description: Clicking this button displays a form to create a new application.

button.title: Edit
button.description: Clicking this button enables the editing of the application attributes.

button.title: Delete
button.description: Clicking this button deletes the application permanently.

button.title: Add user to management unit
button.description: Clicking this button displays a form to enter the name of the user you wish to add to the selected management unit.

button.title: Edit
button.description: Clicking this button enables editing of the list of permissions linked to the user.

button.title: Delete
button.description: Clicking this button removes the user's permission permanently.

button.title: Edit
button.description: Clicking this button enables editing of the list of users linked to the permit.

button.title: Create
button.description: Clicking this button displays a form to create a new document group.

button.title: Edit
button.description: Clicking this button enables the editing of the attributes of the document group.

button.title: Delete
button.description: Clicking this button deletes the document group permanently.

select.name: Select
select.edit: Edit the attributes of the selected elements

delete.name: Delete
delete.title: Deleting element in '{{layername}}'
delete.confirmMsg: It will delete the selected item. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

errors.eventNotAllowedOnWeekDay: The agenda does not support events on {{weekday}}
errors.eventNotAllowedOnWeekDayHour: The agenda only supports events on {{weekday}} from {{start}} to {{end}}

title.feature: Documentary record of the selected entity in layer '{{layername}}'

media.error: File size exceeds the limit of 5MB

incidents.name: Incidents

title.feature: Incidents of the selection in layer '{{layername}}'

incidents.question: Do you wish to be notified after your issue has been resolved?

count.selection: Total registered: {{total}} | Shown in table: {{shown}} | Total selected: {{selection}}

pendingSave.title: There are unsaved changes!
pendingSave.content: Do you want to save your changes before exiting?

form.requiredField: A value is needed for the field '{{fieldName}}'. Please enter a value
form.greaterThanNow: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be greater than the current time
form.smallerThanNow: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be smaller than the current time
form.greaterThanField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be greater than the field '{{comparedFieldName}}'
form.greaterEqualThanField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be equal or greater than the field '{{comparedFieldName}}'
form.smallerThanField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be smaller than the field '{{comparedFieldName}}'
form.smallerEqualThanField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be equal or smaller than the field '{{comparedFieldName}}'
form.dniField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be a valid TIN
form.nieField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be a valid NIE
form.cifField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be a valid CIF
form.dniNieCifField: The field '{{fieldName}}' must be a valid NIF, NIE or CIF
form.statusIncident: Assignment of a previous status is not allowed. Contact the administrator.
form.dependOn: The value of the field ‘{{comparedFieldName}}’ is not valid.

error.title: The operation could not be completed!
error.Access denied exception: You are not authorized to perform this operation
error.Authentication required exception: You must be authenticated to use this resource
error.Invalid credentials exception: Your login credentials are not valid
error.Item Already exist: That element already exists in the System
error.No File exception: The file does not exist in the system
error.No Map exception: The map does not exist in the system
error.No Media exception: The documentary record does not exist in the System
error.No Resource exception: The required resource does not exist in the System
error.No Resource group exception: The document archive group does not exist in the System
error.No Unit info exception: The Management Unit does not exist in the System
error.No UnitUSer info exception: The User - Unit does not exist in the System
error.No User exception: The User does not exist in the System
error.No Layer exception: The layer does not exist in the System
error.No Directory exception: The directory configured for the drive does not exist for the management unit
error.Schedule out of limit range exception: The event is outside the time range that allows modifications in this agenda. You cannot create, modify or delete events outside this time range.
error.Schedule overlap not allowed exception: This agenda does not support overlapping events. Find a free space in the agenda
error.Schedule user limmit exceeded exception: The reservation cannot be made, as the time limit of reservations allowed per period for the user has been exceeded.
error.Wrong media config exception: Document registration configuration is not correct

success.title: Request completed!
success.save: The record has been successfully saved
success.delete: The indicated record has been successfully deleted
success.delete_multiple: The indicated records have been deleted correctly
success.update: The indicated record has been successfully updated
success.deleteMedia: The associated documents have been successfully deleted
success.insertMedia: The associated documents have been successfully saved

user.permissions: List of users associated with the permission

user.units: Management units associated with the user
user.setUserName2Add: Indicate the username you want to add

unit.path: Path to the management unit's QGIS resources
unit.users: Users associated with the management unit

form.name: Choose form and info sheet styles

name_logo.name: Choose name and logo for the app

params.numberApps: Choose the number of visible applications in the side menu

welcomeTourMessage.name: Welcome message
welcomeTourMessage.description: Configuration of the message you want to be displayed as a welcome to users

infoMessage.name: Warning message
infoMessage.description: Configuration of the warning message that you want to appear to users when they enter the application between the dates indicated.

reactBigCalendar.noEventsInRange: There are no events in the selected interval

text.logIn: All non-registered users have access to the applications for consultation. Registered users have access to more content and advanced functionalities. Your personal data will be incorporated into the processing system for which the council of {{name}} is responsible. You have the right to access, rectify and delete the data, as well as the other rights granted by the data protection regulations.

loggedIn.admin: Welcome user {{username}}. You are logged in as user {{userrole}}. You currently have permissions to manage the entire web application. You can create, edit and delete drives, applications and users. You can add and manage permissions on drives and applications. You can manage content for all applications.
loggedIn.manager: Welcome user {{username}}. You are logged in as user {{userrole}}. You currently have permissions to manage and edit the applications and their contents of the management units: {{unidades}}.

map.text1: The component has elements that are shown in the legend. You can try the buttons of the map in order to use the tools or to show new windows.

report.text1: In this view you can download reports in PDF format.
report.text2: You can filter the report data by date.

html.text1: The HTML template is used to put additional information in a component.

table.text1: In the table you can see the data of the elements belonging to an information layer.
table.text2: In the table you can download data, apply filters, perform element selection and element editing.
table.text4: will show you more information about the tools.

opendata.text: You are watching the component Open Data.
opendata.text1: In this component you can download various formats of the data of an information layer.

slide1.text: In the top right menu, you can log in to the system or change the language.

slide2.text: In the left side menu you have access to the main modules of URBEGIS. Depending on the permissions you have, more or less modules will be enabled (General information, access to applications, or management and administration tools).
slide2.text1: In the applications tab, you will see the applications enabled for your user credentials.

slide3.text: As you access the main modules, you will be presented with specific new content in the main window.

slide4.text: In the case of applications, a top menu will be displayed, specific to each application, which will allow you to navigate through the different content.

msg.info: You must writte at least one of these inputs: name, first name, second name

success.title: Accepted
success.text: Burial unit successfully selected, you can proceed to the next step.

warning.title: Warning
warning.text1: The selected burial unit is currently occupied by the following deceased:
warning.text3: No more than 5 years have passed since the last action on this burial unit.
warning.text4: The selected burial unit is currently booked.

error.title: Error
error.text: Only ashes can be kept in a columbarium type funeral unit. Check the type of remains selected or change the burial unit.
